english.segment1: The sun and moon and every star. Are there to show me who You are. I can be sure your fingerprints. Are everywhere
english.segment2: My every move, my every breath. Were meant to point to your greatness. There's nothing made that was not made. To show Your power
english.segment3: These hands were made to praise You. These lips were made to lift You up. I give to You my life in worship. These feet were made to serve You. This tongue, to sing of Your great love. I give to You my life in worship
english.segment4: A tender thought, a caring deed. A gift of love to one in need. Bringing honest acts of worship to You, Lord
english.segment5: Lifting holy hands in worship to You, Lord. God, receive this humble sacrifice of praise
